validations.sql: Select * from PEDT001 base left join HE1_MX_CAT_ENT_FINAN_DRO ref on (base.COD_ENT = ref.COD_ENT and base.FCH_CORTE_DATOS = ref.FCH_CORTE_DATOS and base.NUM_VER_PROC = ref.NUM_VER_PROC)

Select * from PEDT001 base left join HE1_MX_CAT_TAB_CORP_ALTAIR_DRO ref on (base.COD_ENT=ref.COD_ENT and base.COD_TIPO_DOCTO_ORIG=ref.COD_CVE_REG and base.NUM_VER_PROC=ref.NUM_VER_PROC and base.FCH_CORTE_DATOS=ref.FCH_CORTE_DATOS) where ref.COD_SIGLA_IDIOMA='E' and ref.COD_TAB_GEN='0113'

Select * from PEDT001 base left join HE1_MX_CAT_CENTROS_OPER_DRO ref on (base.COD_ENT = ref.COD_ENT and base.FCH_CORTE_DATOS = ref.FCH_CORTE_DATOS and base.NUM_VER_PROC = ref.NUM_VER_PROC and base.COD_SUC=ref.COD_CENTRO)

Select * from PEDT001 base left join HE1_MX_CAT_INTERNO_DRO ref on (base.FCH_CORTE_DATOS = ref.FCH_CORTE_DATOS and base.NUM_VER_PROC = ref.NUM_VER_PROC and base.COD_SEXO_PER = ref.COD_CVE_RGTRO) where base.COD_TIPO_PER = 'F' and ref.COD_CATALOGO = '0010'

Select * from PEDT001 base left join HE1_MX_CAT_TAB_CORP_ALTAIR_DRO ref on (base.COD_ENT=ref.COD_ENT and base.COD_PAIS_NAC_ORIG=ref.COD_CVE_REG and base.NUM_VER_PROC=ref.NUM_VER_PROC and base.FCH_CORTE_DATOS=ref.FCH_CORTE_DATOS) where ref.COD_SIGLA_IDIOMA='E' and ref.COD_TAB_GEN='0112'
